title: A Disturbing Wikiality
body: <p>Apparently <a href="http://www.wikipedia.org/">Wikipedia</a> has fallen victim to the anti-American, anti-Christian, anti-capitalist, and pro-evolution liberal media bias. If you read <a href="http://www.conservapedia.com/Main_Page" rel="nofollow">Conservapedia</a> like <a href="http://www.wikiality.com/">Stephen Colbert</a> would, then it's actually kinda funny. The fact that they are offended by British spellings and the use of CE instead of AD for dates is kinda funny too. I guess since wikipedia isn't explicitly pro-American and pro-Christian, they are anti? If you're not with us, then you're against us, right? or in the words of a <em>uniter</em>: <q>Either you are with us, or you are with the terrorists</q>. I think the best part though, is that they used <a href="http://www.mediawiki.org/">MediaWiki</a> for their site.</p>
